description:
The 18th "Japanese Escape Games" series!

■SYSTEM
■THE GAME SYSTEM
This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game).
*Point the screen with a cursor to solve riddles, and story goes on.

■STORY
I have come to the japanese sweets shop 
that is popular for a cute staff
Since I am a cat lover, my friend encouraged me to visit there

Unfortunately
The rumored staff was out for a break

So I decided to wait on her
With some nice sweets and tea

On the amazingly comfortable tatami
I found myself dozing offーー

I looked around
 when I heard everyone speak loudly……

'Something' was going on in the shop……
name: Japanese NEKOSAMA Escape The Sweets Shop
